title: Basketball clinic
creator_credit: Brendan McKenna, Dick Jones and Seven Network Limited (Australia)
brief_description: This film shows a judicious selection of situations from games of basketball played in Melbourne, using stills, action replays, etc to provide excellent illustrations of playing areas, fouls, and shooting and rebounding skills. It is recommended for use with students who have basic proficiency in basketball.
